$WmMPID_ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You ready, Takumi? We'll fight just as
planned. They'll see the power of
siblings who train together!$k$p$WmMPID_タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I heard you the first time, Hinoka. I
won't do anything reckless. We shall
fight as one.$k$p$Sbs1000|
